title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' function does not work as expected. Specifically, after creating a new file (named f1.txt in this case) and selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, nothing happens.
SR:
1. Launch the application with build 20020508.
2. Create a new file.
3. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
4. Verify that the expected behavior is not observed (i.e., no action is taken).
